planet_copper._note: The Gansu planet is named after the Gansu province of China, where Gansus Yumenensis(a chicken ancestor) fossils were found. Taiyangshou map looks like a bird.
planet_copper.name: Copper Planet
planet_copper.desc: This orange and green planet has some rather impressive electric storms.

planet_barren_gold.name: Barren Planet
planet_barren_gold.desc: This grey world has shiny treasures hidden within.
